Save your money on hosting. Get upto 50% monthly discount or get up to 25% discount for annual payments.

Wait no more. Go ahead and choose the following hosting solution according to your requirements.

• Linux & Windows Shared Hostin

o Use coupon code BHSAVE50 for your shared hosting plan and get a flat 50% discount for a whole year.

• Linux & Windows Reseller Hosting

o Use coupon code VPSCloud50 for Linux (vLite) & Windows (Hyper-V) VPS Hosting to avail a 50% discount on the 1st Month invoice.

o Use coupon code VPSCloud25 for Linux (vLite) & Windows (Hyper-V) VPS Hosting to avail a 25% discount on the annual payment.


• Linux & Windows Dedicated Hosting

o Use coupon code DSSAVE50 to avail a 50% discount for 1st month invoice for all dedicated servers.

o Use coupon code DSSAVE17 to avail 2 months free on Annual Payment for all dedicated servers.
